title: The Momentum of a Decision
description: Small decisions can take you a long way. In “The Momentum Of A Decision,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church shows that faith isn’t just made of the big, flashy leaps, but of the small steps we take every day.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Small decisions can take you a long way. In “The Momentum Of A Decision,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church shows that faith isn’t just made of the big, flashy leaps, but of the small steps we take every day.
